text: Haqeeqat yeh hai ke jo log kisi sanad o hujjat ke bagair jo unke paas aayi ho, Allah ki aayat mein jhagade kar rahey hain unke dilon mein kibr (ghamand /pride) bhara hua hai. Magar woh us badayi ko pahunchne waley nahin hain jiska woh ghamand rakhte hain. Bas Allah ki panaah maang lo, woh sabkuch dekhta aur sunta hai
